name: Fifty Five Seconds Of Being Meaninglessly Chased By Jupiter Hadley In The Woods
name_original: Fifty Five Seconds Of Being Meaninglessly Chased By Jupiter Hadley In The Woods
description:
This game was made for Jupiter Hadley's Birthday Jam as a birthday present for Jupiter Hadley.
-
Note: The visual content of the game was generated using only code and 4 sprite assets.
-
Music samples from "Feel" and "Ghost", by Ty Segal.
